definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: An ice bag or hot water bottle applied to the back many also help to ease the pain.
sentences.chinese: 許多也幫助鎮痛的冰袋或熱水袋適用於後面。

sentences.english: The use of warming blankets and fluid warmers has been proven beneficial.
sentences.chinese: 使用暖牀毯和熱水袋可減輕低體溫。

sentences.english: Method 3 Reshuidai can warm the body.
sentences.chinese: 方法三，熱水袋可溫暖身體。

sentences.english: Before bed, put heating pads or warm wet towels on your knees for half an hour.
sentences.chinese: 睡前用熱水袋或熱的溼毛巾熱敷膝蓋半個小時。

sentences.english: Tuck a hot-water bottle between your feet or wear a pair of ski socks to bed.
sentences.chinese: 在你雙腳之間放一隻熱水袋或者穿一雙滑雪襪子睡覺。

sentences.english: A hot water bottle will make you feel cosier.
sentences.chinese: 用個熱水袋你就會覺得暖和些了。

sentences.english: Shall I put your hot-water bottle at the foot of your bed, or in the middle?
sentences.chinese: 我把你的熱水袋放在牀腳頭還是牀當中？

sentences.english: Hot pad or water bottle place to lower abdominal region or lower back.
sentences.chinese: 可以放一個熱水袋或水樽到女孩的下腹部或腰部。

definition: summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
thermos bottle/vacuum bottle/hot water dispenser (appliance)/CL:個|个[ge4]
